Uses of Class
io.permazen.vaadin.ReloadableJObjectContainer

  • Packages that use ReloadableJObjectContainer 
    Package Description
    io.permazen.vaadin
    Classes to facilitate Vaadin applications that interact with a Permazen database.
    io.permazen.vaadin.app
    Support for Permazen GUI applications based on Vaadin.

    • Uses of ReloadableJObjectContainer in io.permazen.vaadin

      Subclasses of ReloadableJObjectContainer in io.permazen.vaadin 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  ExprQueryJObjectContainer
      QueryJObjectContainer whose query is defined by a Java expression.
      class  QueryJObjectContainer
      Vaadin Container backed by Permazen Java model objects acquired by performing a transactional query and copying out the results into a SnapshotJTransaction.
      class  SnapshotJObjectContainer
      Specialized JObjectContainer for use with key/value stores that implement KVTransaction.mutableSnapshot().

    • Uses of ReloadableJObjectContainer in io.permazen.vaadin.app

      Methods in io.permazen.vaadin.app with parameters of type ReloadableJObjectContainer 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void JObjectEditorWindow.setReloadContainerAfterCommit​(ReloadableJObjectContainer container)
      Configure a container to be reload()'ed after any successful edit.
